content.text:
# T-Bone Burnett Presents The Speaking Clock Revue: Live from the Beacon Theatre

T-Bone Burnett Presents The Speaking Clock Revue: Live from the Beacon Theatre is a 2011 live album featuring various musicians such as Elton John, Leon Russell, John Mellencamp, Elvis Costello, Gregg Allman, Ralph Stanley, Jeff Bridges and T Bone Burnett.
Track listing
# "Jimmie Standing in the Rain" by Elvis Costello – 5:57
# "Midnight Rider" by Gregg Allman – 3:26
# "Hold On, Hold On" by Neko Case – 2:55
# "Rye Whiskey" by Punch Brothers – 3:33
# "Wonderful (The Way I Feel)" by Yim Yames – 4:26
# "The Truth Is in the Dirt" by Karen Elson – 4:16
# "The One I Love Is Gone" by the Secret Sisters – 4:08
# "Troubled Land" by John Mellencamp – 3:55
# "Lift Him Up That's All" by Ralph Stanley – 3:47
# "Fallin' & Flyin'" by Jeff Bridges – 3:26
# "Monkey Suit" by Elton John and Leon Russell – 5:13
